医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究调查了异维A酸治疗后痤疮复发的频率异维A酸，通常称为Accutane，是唯一被批准能够长期缓解严重痤疮的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-examines-how-often-acne-recurs-after-isotretinoin-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-examines-how-often-acne-recurs-after-isotretinoin-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3400f6e5-e113-4837-a988-b2a3a69c7477 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 14:45:03 -0500 Study examines how often acne recurs after isotretinoin treatment
研究揭示香烟烟雾如何削弱肺部的免疫细胞吸烟非常普遍且致命，但我们对香烟烟雾实际上如何导致严重呼吸道疾病的了解并不完整，这严重阻碍了有效治疗方法的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-reveals-how-香烟-smoke-weakens-immune-cells-in-the-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-reveals-how-香烟-smoke-weakens-immune-cells-in-the-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=697687f7-5dc7-4336-b86f-852a5e9f309c Wed, 15 Jan 2025 13:27:48 -0500 Study reveals how cigarette smoke weakens immune cells in the lungs
PIN1 蛋白被发现是膀胱癌的重要驱动因素与所有癌症一样，当异常细胞开始繁殖失控时，膀胱癌就会发生。但如果我们能够限制它们的增长呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/PIN1- Protein-found-to-be-a-significant-driver-of-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/PIN1- Protein-found-to-be-a-significant-driver-of-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb279159-8f4d-4121-86dc-729ae9d34ffe Wed, 15 Jan 2025 13:18:43 -0500 PIN1 protein found to be a significant driver of bladder cancer
研究确定妊娠糖尿病进展背后的分子机制在患有妊娠期糖尿病的人中，大约 35% 的人会在十年内患上 2 型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-identizes-molecular-mechanisms-behind-gestational-diabetes-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-identizes-molecular-mechanisms-behind-gestational-diabetes-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=307eeec3-93a0-4cd3-ac97-7f2f15ef0cb5 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 13:00:12 -0500 Study identifies molecular mechanisms behind gestational diabetes progression
新的人工智能模型为无需手术即可检测脑癌扩散提供了希望研究人员开发了一种...研究人员开发了一种人工智能 (AI) 模型，可使用 MRI 扫描检测转移性脑癌的扩散情况，无需进行积极手术即可深入了解患者的癌症情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/New-AI-model-offers-hope-for-detecting-brain-cancer-spread-without-surgery-Researchers-Have-Developed-A.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/New-AI-model-offers-hope-for-detecting-brain-cancer-spread-without-surgery-Researchers-Have-Developed-A.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda727b5-eda7-460d-81d7-939e3e8a2797 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 12:53:49 -0500 New AI model offers hope for detecting brain cancer spread without surgery Researchers Have Developed A...
Mayo Clinic 与 Microsoft Research 和 Cerebras 合作，彻底改变医疗保健领域的人工智能梅奥诊所 (Mayo Clinic) 今天公布了与微软研究院 (Microsoft Research) 和 Cerebras Systems 在生成人工智能 (AI) 领域的突破性合作，旨在个性化患者护理、显着加快诊断时间并提高准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Mayo-Clinic-partners-with-Microsoft-Research-and-Cerebras-to-revolutionize-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Mayo-Clinic-partners-with-Microsoft-Research-and-Cerebras-to-revolutionize-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df2c10c9-e7c1-45ac-bd0e-3fab83f07a7b Wed, 15 Jan 2025 12:30:58 -0500 Mayo Clinic partners with Microsoft Research and Cerebras to revolutionize AI in healthcare
大学生在假期期间增加了新的肌肉，而不是脂肪随着假期的过去，许多美国人发现体重秤上的数字增加了一两磅。事实上，数据显示，许多美国中年人和老年人在 11 月至 1 月的假期期间体重增加了 1 至 1.5 磅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/College-students-gain-new-muscle-not-fat-during-the-holiday-season.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/College-students-gain-new-muscle-not-fat-during-the-holiday-season.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b1f3f1-a582-4d1a-aff2-d5d47a6355ae Wed, 15 Jan 2025 12:23:33 -0500 College students gain new muscle, not fat during the holiday season
研究人员发现了针对血管炎症和动脉粥样硬化的自然防御研究揭示了 IGFBP6 在抑制血管炎症和动脉粥样硬化中的作用，表明它是心血管疾病治疗的新靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Researchers-identify-a-natural-defense-against-blood-vessel-inflammation-and-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Researchers-identify-a-natural-defense-against-blood-vessel-inflammation-and-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5617a55-439b-4db0-ba9c-92c706d6b01d Wed, 15 Jan 2025 11:45:00 -0500 Researchers identify a natural defense against blood vessel inflammation and atherosclerosis
研究探讨激素避孕药的癌症风险许多女性担心激素避孕药有危险的副作用，包括增加癌症风险。但这种认知往往与实际风险不成比例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-explores-cancer-risks-of-hormonal-contraceptives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-explores-cancer-risks-of-hormonal-contraceptives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=107b3b4d-5ff2-47e8-87db-31cf585eb19e Wed, 15 Jan 2025 11:43:41 -0500 Study explores cancer risks of hormonal contraceptives
科学家发现特定蛋白质区域如何导致乳腺癌凯斯西储大学医学院的研究人员发现了特定蛋白质区域如何导致乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Scientists-discover-how-specific- Protein-regions-contribute-to-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Scientists-discover-how-specific- Protein-regions-contribute-to-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77463817-b542-458c-a657-b519924a392a Wed, 15 Jan 2025 11:32:12 -0500 Scientists discover how specific protein regions contribute to breast cancer
